summary: Terry Fontenot addressed a recent report from ESPN that the Falcons want a new team to pick up $20 million of Cousins’s remaining $37.5 million in full guarantees. If he gets injured while working out at the local Planet Fitness, the Falcons could void his remaining guarantees and move on. And it’s hard to imagine him agreeing to a trade to a team that won’t install him as the starter.
